lmm.mediaworker

Class VideoResizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lmm.mediaworker.VideoResizer

  • public class VideoResizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to resize a video file.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoResizer(java.lang.String urlOriginal, java.lang.String temporary, ManageFilmController realController)
      Constructs a new VideoResizer given some inputs and a ManageFilmController.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startEncoding(java.lang.String finalPath, java.lang.Integer codeFilm)
      This method start the encoding of the original file video and finished the first resizing it will call a VideoIcon.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoResizer

        public VideoResizer(java.lang.String urlOriginal,
            java.lang.String temporary,
            ManageFilmController realController)
        Constructs a new VideoResizer given some inputs and a ManageFilmController.
        Parameters:
        urlOriginal - Path of the original file video
        temporary - Path of the temporary file video that will be created
        realController - Controller that invoke this Class

    • Method Detail

      • startEncoding

        public void startEncoding(java.lang.String finalPath,
                 java.lang.Integer codeFilm)
                   throws UnsupportedCodecException,
                          NoVideoIconException
        This method start the encoding of the original file video and finished the first resizing it will call a VideoIcon.
        Parameters:
        finalPath - Path of the file video that will be use to display to users
        codeFilm - used to know which film has been modified
        Throws:
        UnsupportedCodecException - caused when file video use codec not supported by Xuggler
        NoVideoIconException - caused when the icon file is unreachable
